bIncludeSoftPackageReferences: Dependencies which don't need to be loaded for the object to be used (i.e. soft object paths)
bIncludeHardPackageReferences: Dependencies which are required for correct usage of the source asset, and must be loaded at the same time
bIncludeSearchableNames: References to specific SearchableNames inside a package
bIncludeSoftManagementReferences: Indirect management references, these are set through recursion for Primary Assets that manage packages or other primary assets
bIncludeHardManagementReferences: Reference that says one object directly manages another object, set when Primary Assets manage things explicitly
